header_info:
It's a small room
but there's no ceiling.

services.title: Purple Room Studio offers everything from a full album production to single services including Recording, Mixing, Mastering & Live sound.
services.content: Purple Room Studio is driven by passion and most of all wants to help indie and upcoming bands and musicians bring their music to life

1.title: Recording
1.content: Everything from full band recording to solo projects

2.title: Mixing
2.content: Mixing of recorded material full projects or tasks.

3.title: Mastering
3.content: Mastering and production of mixed material.

4.title: Live Sound
4.content: Live sound engineering for concert and events.
